item.title: Intro to R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can format text into italics, boldness, or a variety of sizes of titles: text text text text text You can format an equation: \(A = \pi*r^{2}\) You can embed an R code chunk: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi there My name is Radek and I'm the author of this theme. I made it to help you present your ideas easier. We all know how hard is to start something on the web, especially these days. You need to prepare a bunch of stuff, configure them and when that’s done — create the content. This theme is pretty basic and covers all of the essentials. All you have to do is start typing!
